subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Without much in the way of women’s basketball tradition at the Texas-El Paso, Coach Keitha Adams has gotten the Miners to believe in themselves, and the team has started to see some success.
snippet: Without much in the way of women’s basketball tradition at the Texas-El Paso, Coach Keitha Adams has gotten the Miners to believe in themselves, and the team has started to see some success.
